greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Index of first occurrence of n in A181391, or 0 if n never appears.
link: N. J. A. Sloane and Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms 1..1594 from N. J. A. Sloane)
mathematica: seq[m_] := seq[m] = Module[{b, last}, b[_] = 0; last[_] = -1; last[0] = 2; nxt = 1; Do[hist = last[nxt]; b[n] = nxt; last[nxt] = n; nxt = 0; If[hist > 0, nxt = n - hist], {n, 3, m}];
While[Print["m = ", m]; seq[m] != seq[m/2], m = 2 m;];
seq[m] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 02 2018, borrowing some Maple code from _N. J. A. Sloane_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 17 2010
